name: MAD BULL STUNT RALLY - ( Top Free Addictive Arcade / Action 3D Mad Bull Racing Fun Game )
name_original: MAD BULL STUNT RALLY - ( Top Free Addictive Arcade / Action 3D Mad Bull Racing Fun Game )
description:
It's gonna be a tough ride On MAD BULL !

Let the mayhem begin in this cool 3D Mad Bull Stunt Rally game. You will have to Race skilfully to take down all the missions during the game play.

The game features real physics that should be skilfully used to play the game.


* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
* Dozens of enemies to Defeat.

Let's Play MAD BULL STUNT RALLY And Enjoy The Amazing Ride.
